text: Cindy & I send our heartfelt condolences to the family & friends of Staff Sgt. Alexander W. Conrad of Chandler, #Arizona https://t.co/Dzglm2f7sT

Sending full support to @tsipras_eu & @Zoran_Zaev as they work together to solve the #Macedonia naming dispute. If they continue to show the courage of statesmen, greater security & prosperity will be the result for both their countries & the region! https://t.co/1ZmjYJk6Y6
A worthy honor for an extraordinary man: "@usairforce honors #Vietnam hero who served in 3 wars, was John McCain’s cellmate in the Hanoi Hilton" https://t.co/j22ziJCaJz
Must-read column by @marcthiessen in @washingtonpost today: "On Charles Krauthammer, my friend, mentor and lodestar" https://t.co/aDlr4l8iYA

US sanctions on Hun Sen's bodyguards represent a positive step forward in holding the regime accountable. More designations should come if brutal crackdown on opposition leaders & civil society in #Cambodia continues https://t.co/tUiuJTn7BW
Thank you my friend @JeffFlake https://t.co/bgc4ICrwiL
Must-read by @vkaramurza in @washingtonpost: "Yes, #Russia should rejoin the Group of Seven — when it becomes a democracy" https://t.co/KnNMFmL9jc

I'm deeply honored @SenJackReed & my colleagues have voted to designate the Strategic Defense Fellows Program in my name. This program will help the next generation begin career paths toward senior leadership in the @DeptofDefense.

Suspending US-South Korea joint military exercises is a mistake. I hope the President is successful in his efforts to achieve full denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula. But making unnecessary & unreciprocated concessions is not in our interests. https://t.co/ntvxgEVAwz
Must-read @WSJ: "A Troops for Nukes Trade? U.S. forces in South Korea do far more than protect Seoul" https://t.co/09twqxAn0J

I'm very proud the Senate voted 85-10 to pass the #FY19NDAA, vital legislation that will provide for our men & women in uniform while helping the military restore readiness, rebuild capacity & modernize capabilities. https://t.co/5MpOSvGQFn

The administration’s current family separation policy is an affront to the decency of the American people, and contrary to principles and values upon which our nation was founded. The administration has the power to rescind this policy. It should do so now.
Wonderful @washingtonpost piece on my friend @SenatorDole, a man who can teach all Americans about what it means to selflessly serve: "Bob Dole’s final mission" https://t.co/ClYiLWwehc
Must-read @washingtonpost by human rights icon Natan Sharansky: "The U.S. stood with Soviet dissidents. It should stand with North Korean ones, too" https://t.co/piEtep4j7o

Sent letter w/ @ChrisCoons urging the admin to withdraw nomination of Ronald Mortensen to lead US refugee & migration policy. Mortensen has spread misinformation about immigrants & displayed a lack of empathy for innocent people fleeing oppression. https://t.co/H3jfK32qX1
Sent letter today urging @DeptVetAffairs to address poor quality ratings at #Arizona VA nursing homes https://t.co/BOaXiHh7YO

Cindy & I are deeply saddened by the passing of our friend Charles Krauthammer. Brilliant, kind, funny & generous, Charles stands as an example to all of us of how to live with civility and a passion for the truth. https://t.co/CNwIIC1QC6
Cindy & I send our prayers to the family & friends of Lt. Christopher Carey Short who was tragically killed in an A-29 crash in New Mexico. https://t.co/EKruhmvfn0
Must-read @azcentral: "Granite Mountain Hotshots: An untold story from the day 19 firefighters died" https://t.co/Wbkee1zwAe
Must-read @WSJ: "Trump Rides a Harley—to Europe: The U.S. casualties of his trade war are starting to mount" https://t.co/TPacnAwp5X
Congratulations to my friend @MittRomney on his victory last night - an outstanding leader for #Utah & the nation! #utpol
Thank you @jamiemfly for the great review in @weeklystandard of my new book #TheRestlessWave! https://t.co/YJahRn50fU
Must-read @nytimes: "What Does the United States Stand For?" https://t.co/C0dzQkn7RQ
Cindy & I are praying for the families, friends & colleagues of the victims of the terrible shooting @capitalgazette, as well as the entire #Annapolis community.
Must-read @MiamiHerald: “#Nicaragua’s bloodshed is worse than #Venezuela’s. Where’s the international uproar?” https://t.co/2WbHytyLYy

As I mark this #IndependenceDay at home in #Arizona, my thoughts are w/ the brave & selfless patriots serving around the world, who shoulder our burdens every day to secure the freedom we celebrate on this holiday. https://t.co/X3zyssTKg4 https://t.co/8pvptFndQF
Must-read @washingtonpost: "A British woman just died from Novichok poisoning. We must know whether #Russia’s at fault." https://t.co/JZ8owQJGib
Important read by @jensstoltenberg in @WSJ: "America’s #NATO Allies Are Stepping Up" https://t.co/dlOXP4akWG

Journalism is not a crime. The charges against @Reuters reporters Wa Lone & Kyaw Soe Oo for exposing ethnic cleansing in #Burma are outrageous & politically motivated. The bogus charges should be dropped & these journalists should be released immediately. https://t.co/Cv7eICcQgu

Judge Brett Kavanaugh has impeccable credentials & a strong record of upholding the Constitution. He is widely respected as a fair, independent & mainstream judge. I look forward to the Senate moving forward with a fair & thorough confirmation process. https://t.co/5Y5oWo36RB
Must-read @washingtonpost: "A glimmer of hope for press freedom abroad" https://t.co/kfpn8GJW1o

Liu Xia should never have been imprisoned. Now that she has finally been freed, #China must fulfill its pledge to respect human rights & immediately release the dozens of other political prisoners who are being unjustly detained. https://t.co/wgru7DL9Ki

No US policy or strategy in Europe can succeed without a strong #NATO alliance. Allies can & must have candid discussions about differences. But unrestrained attacks on our closest partners will only sow dissent among our allies & embolden our adversaries. https://t.co/D8HLQaF5sB
Must-read @RHFontaine @CNASdc & @vanceserchuk in @TheAtlantic today: "The West Will Survive Trump" https://t.co/85kxbpkHXx
Important read by @antonioguterres in @washingtonpost: "The #Rohingya are victims of ethnic cleansing. The world has failed them." https://t.co/OUS85MjNp1
Must-read @nytimes: "Trump Derides #NATO as ‘Obsolete.’ #Baltic Nations See It Much Differently." https://t.co/L0rmPFs02y
Must-read @RNicholasBurns in @nytimes: "What America Gets Out of #NATO" https://t.co/BNwVbBJ38P

Deeply saddened by the passing of my comrade Gen. Tom Browning - @AF_Academy grad, POW for more than 6 years in North Vietnam, former commander of @LukeAFB & engaged civic leader in #Arizona. Our prayers are with Tom's family during this difficult time. https://t.co/yMhlLwgrqL

I'm deeply honored to be added to the USS John S McCain namesake along with my heroes, my father & grandfather. I hope the sailors who will serve aboard the USS McCain will find the same fulfillment as my family in serving a cause greater than oneself. https://t.co/v6KsPMq4Rq https://t.co/HGFVvrwxq7

.@POTUS's performance at #NATOSummit was disappointing, yet unsurprising. There's little use in parsing his misstatements & bluster, except to say that they are the words of one man. Americans & their Congress still believe in the transatlantic alliance. https://t.co/mtjxPFBeVz
Must-read @vkaramurza @washingtonpost: "Trump should ask #Putin to release Russian political prisoners" https://t.co/m4ifXADjdd
Important @washingtonpost read: "A persecuted woman is free at last, but #China’s cruelty persists" https://t.co/4VHss0eXzk
Must-read @WSJ: "What #Putin Wants From Trump" https://t.co/8YiUxVo1K2
Today’s indictment is a result of the hard work of America’s law enforcement and intelligence officials who dedicate their lives to bringing to justice those who wish to do us harm.

The #Ortega regime’s brutal crackdown on peaceful protestors in #Nicaragua is reprehensible. He must end the bloodshed and respect the democratic aspirations of the brave Nicaraguan people who yearn for freedom and peace. https://t.co/Zk7JLUtZzt

Today’s press conference in #Helsinki was one of the most disgraceful performances by an American president in memory.

My full statement on the #HelsinkiSummit: https://t.co/lApjctZyZl
Must-read @joshrogin @washingtonpost: "#Putin just confirmed the human rights sanctions are working" #MagnitskyAct https://t.co/aVfSk68RDn
Important read by @RHFontaine @CNASdc & @DCTwining @IRIglobal: "Standing Up for Democracy: American Values and Great Power Competition" https://t.co/iagmyEEa0g
Must-read by @TomSchatzCAGW @GovWaste in @USATODAY: "Earmarks explosion: Republicans could set record with big spending on pork barrel projects" #PigBook https://t.co/hLp8lcp5IL
Don't miss @GovWaste's 2018 #PigBook, which exposes $14.7B in congressional earmarks & wasteful government spending in FY18: https://t.co/gwH077NuRf

The people of #Montenegro boldly withstood pressure from #Putin’s Russia to embrace democracy. The Senate voted 97-2 supporting its accession to #NATO. By attacking Montenegro & questioning our obligations under NATO, the President is playing right into Putin’s hands.
Happy birthday to my dear friend @SenatorDole - a true American hero! https://t.co/7b16zcSErD

I’m very proud the Senate & House Armed Services Committees have completed conference of the #FY19NDAA. This bill carries on Congress’s long, proud tradition of bipartisanship when it comes to supporting our military & the brave men & women who serve. https://t.co/cibqnwO1Rt

Deeply saddened by the passing of my friend, former #NewYork Congressman Guy Molinari. Guy dedicated his life to public service - as a proud Marine, in Congress & across local gov't. Cindy & I send our prayers to Guy's family & friends during this difficult time.
Glad my bill w/ @JeffFlake to fully implement the White Mountain Apache Tribe Water Settlement & complete the Miner Flat Dam is headed to the President's desk https://t.co/V2aF9UmfVX

Intro'd bill w/ @SenatorCardin to add the #MagnitskyAct to our #Russia sanctions bill. This will ensure Congress has the ability to prevent any attempt by the administration to change or weaken this landmark human rights law. https://t.co/PGCxsit5hy

Great to hear the House has passed the #FY19NDAA, critical legislation supporting our troops. I commend @MacTXPress & @RepAdamSmith for their leadership in advancing this important bill for our service members & the nation. Look forward to the Senate passing this bill soon!

Proud to intro bill w/ @timkaine @SenCoryGardner & @SenJackReed to ensure that no president can withdraw from #NATO without the constitutionally required advice & consent of the Senate — a body that overwhelmingly supports the transatlantic alliance. https://t.co/vZYxC7LIZP

Hun Sen's claim of victory in sham election robs the Cambodian people of their right to freely and fairly choose their leaders. The international community must strongly condemn any attempt by the Hun Sen regime to legitimize its actions. https://t.co/ZAeORM7ukM

Grateful to @IRIglobal & @NDI for their work to ensure a free & fair election in #Zimbabwe. Public faith in the electoral process is critical to freedom worldwide. Today’s vote provides a historic opportunity for the Zimbabwean people to choose the trajectory of their country.
Must-read @nytimes: "Military Bases in the Sand" https://t.co/u4x3ua2C8j
Must-read @marcthiessen @washingtonpost: "#NATO’s purpose is to ensure we don’t have to defend #Montenegro" https://t.co/fKTjM5FjTa
.@WSJ: "U.S. Defense Bill Seeks to Counter #China: Beijing’s increased military activity in South China Sea, pursuit of U.S. technology among issues" #FY19NDAA https://t.co/b2MU7tmUNW

I'm deeply proud the Senate voted overwhelmingly today to pass the #FY19NDAA. I thank my colleagues @SenJackReed @JimInhofe @MacTXPress & @RepAdamSmith for their leadership, collaboration & bipartisanship on this important legislation.
Must-read by @cindymccain & @tomperriello in @washingtonpost: "For the sake of #Congo’s democracy, Kabila must change course" https://t.co/XSf2aXzXof
Congrats Captain Coyote, my good friend Shane Doan - a well-deserved honor! https://t.co/Ct8gnLiyPb

Our top intelligence officials have repeatedly warned that #Putin continues to target our elections & sow chaos. Until he pays a price, these attacks will grow. Intro’d new sanctions bill w/ my colleagues to deter Russian aggression & defend our democracy. https://t.co/wi6lsbxRnn

Serving as chairman of @IRIglobal for 25 years has been a great honor & I look forward to continuing to serve on its board & support its mission. @SenDanSullivan will be an excellent new leader as IRI continues to advocate for democracy & freedom worldwide.https://t.co/cZ500OkXNL
The top of my summer reading list! “Hemingway War Story Sees Print for the First Time” https://t.co/F66jLLcfxl

Congratulations to my former @USNavy fellow @VicGlover on being selected to fly @SpaceX's #CrewDragon capsule on its first operational mission to the @Space_Station. A tremendous, well-deserved honor! https://t.co/8xxB2cWcAV

Cindy & I are saddened by the passing of Art Sloane, @usairforce & @USCG veteran & @azcentral columnist, who devoted his life in service to his country & #Arizona's veterans. We send our condolences to Art's friends & family. https://t.co/vqhiSzRNul
Must-read @IgnatiusPost @washingtonpost: "The Chinese threat that an aircraft carrier can’t stop" https://t.co/c0JEmDs5jL

Good to see @StateDept moving forward with new sanctions on #Putin’s #Russia for its chemical attack in #Britain. Congress must continue to exercise strong oversight to ensure these sanctions are swiftly & fully implemented. https://t.co/y889BtivPi

I'm proud the NDAA is now law & humbled Congress chose to designate it in my name. As Chairman of the Armed Services Cmte, I've found high purpose in service of a cause greater than self—the cause of our troops who defend America & all that she stands for. https://t.co/Gco9E57HdC

Today a grateful nation salutes the Navajo Code Talkers whose bravery & skill saved the lives of countless Americans during WWII. History will forever marvel at the Navajos who used their language as an unbreakable code to help secure Allied victories. #NavajoCodeTalkersDay https://t.co/dAvya5Fg6x
Happy 75th birthday to the USS Intrepid & best wishes to my fellow sailors who served on her! #Intrepid75 https://t.co/aiTlllCe64

Imp’t step by @USTreasury to sanction Burmese officials under Global Magnitsky Act for their brutal campaign against the Rohingya people. With atrocities growing, the US must do more to hold accountable human rights abusers in #Burma & around the world. https://t.co/8Zk8LcLR8S
.@NewYorker: “John McCain and the End of Romantic Conservatism” https://t.co/r16gpkVTdV
Cindy and I send our prayers to the family and friends of Chief Warrant Officer 3 Taylor J. Galvin who was killed in a helicopter crash in #Iraq. https://t.co/mhifwXorDY
